statements: SELECT * FROM customer_transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, timestamp FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount, transaction_type FROM customer_transactions GROUP BY transaction_type;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM customer_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'PURCHASE' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_type, amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id IN (101, 102, 103) AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, timestamp FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id = 102 AND transaction_type LIKE '%refund%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_type, amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY customer_id ASC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM customers, transactions WHERE customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id
SELECT customer_name, SUM(amount) FROM customers, transactions WHERE customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date FROM customers, transactions WHERE customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef'
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type IN ('purchase', 'refund') AND amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT customer_name, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC

SELECT customer_name, AVG(amount) AS average_transaction_amount FROM customers LEFT JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY average_transaction_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_id FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM deposits WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, sum(amount) AS total_amount FROM deposits GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_id FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM deposits WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, deposit_date, amount FROM customers INNER JOIN deposits ON customers.customer_id = deposits.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(amount) AS total_deposits FROM customers INNER JOIN deposits ON customers.customer_id = deposits.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, deposit_date, amount FROM customers INNER JOIN deposits ON customers.customer_id = deposits.customer_id WHERE deposit_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM deposits WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transfers WHERE transfer_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM deposits WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY deposit_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT c.customer_name, d.amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN deposits d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE d.amount < 500
SELECT t.sender_id, t.receiver_id, d.amount FROM transfers t LEFT JOIN deposits d ON t.transfer_id = d.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM deposits WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transfer_id, amount, date FROM transfers WHERE from_account_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM deposits WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, a.balance AS account_balance FROM customers c INNER JOIN accounts a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id;

SELECT t.transfer_id, t.amount, a1.balance AS from_account_balance, a2.balance AS to_account_balance FROM transfers t INNER JOIN accounts a1 ON t.from_account_id = a1.account_id INNER JOIN accounts a2 ON t.to_account_id = a2.account_id WHERE t.amount > 5000 ORDER BY t.date ASC;
